What are some ways to stay updated on Verus developments and community news?

You can stay updated on Verus developments and community news through various channels, including the Verus Website, Official Twitter, Discord, Community Telegram, Facebook, YouTube, Medium, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Community Twitter, Community VerusID Twitter, and Community VerusPay Twitter.

Download the wallet now to try fractional reserve currencies on testnet. See the developments for yourself! If you need help or have questions, don’t hesitate to ask on Discord.
